LanguageData.ComponentFuelTank.label: car fuel tank
LanguageData.ComponentFuelTank.description: Carefully manufactured fuel storage and injection systems. Ideal for vehicles that require greater fuel capacity or even increased fuel consumption without increasing the likelihood of gas leaks or engine damage.
LanguageData.ComponentTransmission.label: car suspension
LanguageData.ComponentTransmission.description: A series of transmissions, springs and shock absorbers that redirect or reduce forces transferred through the wheels. Generally, the greater the mass and cargo capacity of the vehicle, the more suspensions are needed.
